comment._content: he looks a good deal like this man: filipinomasons.blogspot.com/2007/08/wb-jose-reyes-pm-maso... Jose A Reyes, maybe?

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Rafael Reyes Prieto (December 5, 1849, Santa Rosa de Viterbo, Boyacá, Colombia – February 18, 1921, Bogotá) was commander in chief of the Colombian National Army and President of Colombia (1904-1909).. On August 3, 1913 he wrote an article in the New York Times: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9906E7DC113BE6... The article has an engraving of him and it matches. I will start a biography in Wikipedia in a bit: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rafael_Reyes

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: There are other negatives in the Bain collection of this person and they are labeled R. Reyes, so it appears that we have a match. Thanks for helping to clear this up. We'll add the fuller name to the source catalog and correct the erroneous title.
